Works.title: Works

Jusoor.desc: Built a responsive Arabic/English website with service specific designs and performance-optimized animations.

SAAK.desc: Developed a responsive Arabic/English training platform showcasing IPC-certified courses, with scroll-based animations and optimized visuals for smooth performance.

WAKAN.desc: Customized a pre-built template to match wa-kanâ€™s brand identity, focusing on responsive layout and visual consistency.

Mohtaway.title: Mohtaway
Mohtaway.desc: Content-sharing platform with subscription features. The UI was designed in collaboration with a designer, and I implemented the platform, enabling creators to sell videos, books, and podcasts on the Mohtaway marketplace.

FastFlow.title: FAST FLOW
FastFlow.desc: Responsive portfolio website for an events company, focused on clear content presentation, structured sections, and a reliable user experience.

Traders-Tools.title: Trader's Tools
Traders-Tools.desc: React based Chrome extension for traders. The UI was designed in collaboration with a designer, and I handled the full implementation.

LearningCorner.title: Learning Corner
LearningCorner.desc: Learning platform connecting students with their instructor. I customized Msaaq platform pages using embedded HTML and CSS to improve the UI. This project represents an early professional milestone in my web development journey.
